courseDetails.title: Backbone JS Tutorial for Beginners
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn hands-on, step by step tutorials on Backbone JS fundamentals and also create applications using it.
targetAudiences: This Backbone JS Tutorial is open for every individual who wants to master the concept of Backbone JS. The developer who wants to become a full-stack developer  can be the best target audience for this training. They will be learning how to use Backbone JS to develop the user interface which will be amply capable of interacting with the server for some particular events. The students who want to learn how to develop the applications that are usually used at the organizational level can also be the best target audience for this course. They will be learning how to work with Backbone JS from scratch as all the topics that fall under the course of this library will be explained with hand-on. The educators who are training folks for web development can also be the best target audience for this course. As we have covered all the advanced level concepts in this Backbone JS Tutorial, the educators will find it very interesting and after completing this course they will be able to train their students in the same.
